verses.verse: And <WG2532> there came <WG2064> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> which <WG3588> had <WG2192> the seven <WG2033> vials <WG5357>, and <WG2532> talked <WG2980> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>, saying <WG3004> unto me <WG3427>, Come hither <WG1204>; I will shew <WG1166> unto thee <WG4671> the judgment <WG2917> of the great <WG3173> whore <WG4204> that sitteth <WG2521> upon <WG1909> many <WG4183> waters <WG5204>:

With <WG3326> whom <WG3739> the kings <WG935> of the earth <WG1093> have committed fornication <WG4203>, and <WG2532> the inhabitants <WG2730> of the earth <WG1093> have been made drunk <WG3184> with <WG1537> the wine <WG3631> of her <WG846> fornication <WG4202>.

And <WG2532> upon <WG1909> her <WG846> forehead <WG3359> was a name <WG3686> written <WG1125>, MYSTERY <WG3466>, BABYLON <WG897> THE GREAT <WG3173>, THE MOTHER <WG3384> OF HARLOTS <WG4204> AND <WG2532> ABOMINATIONS <WG946> OF THE EARTH <WG1093>. harlots: or, fornications

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> the woman <WG1135> drunken <WG3184> with <WG1537> the blood <WG129> of the saints <WG40>, and <WG2532> with <WG1537> the blood <WG129> of the martyrs <WG3144> of Jesus <WG2424>: and <WG2532> when I saw <WG1492> her <WG846>, I wondered <WG2296> with great <WG3173> admiration <WG2295>.

And <WG2532> the angel <WG32> said <WG2036> unto me <WG3427>, Wherefore <WG1302> didst thou marvel <WG2296>? I <WG1473> will tell <WG2046> thee <WG4671> the mystery <WG3466> of the woman <WG1135>, and <WG2532> of the beast <WG2342> that carrieth <WG941> her <WG846>, which <WG3588> hath <WG2192> the seven <WG2033> heads <WG2776> and <WG2532> ten <WG1176> horns <WG2768>.

The beast <WG2342> that <WG3739> thou sawest <WG1492> was <WG2258>, and <WG2532> is <WG2076> not <WG3756>; and <WG2532> shall <WG3195> ascend <WG305> out of <WG1537> the bottomless pit <WG12>, and <WG2532> go <WG5217> into <WG1519> perdition <WG684>: and <WG2532> they that dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> shall wonder <WG2296>, whose <WG3739> names <WG3686> were <WG1125> not <WG3756> written <WG1125> in <WG1909> the book <WG975> of life <WG2222> from <WG575> the foundation <WG2602> of the world <WG2889>, when they behold <WG991> the beast <WG2342> that was <WG3748> <WG2258>, and <WG2532> is <WG2076> not <WG3756>, and yet <WG2539> is <WG2076>.

And here <WG5602> is the mind <WG3563> which <WG3588> hath <WG2192> wisdom <WG4678>. The seven <WG2033> heads <WG2776> are <WG1526> seven <WG2033> mountains <WG3735>, on <WG1909> which <WG846> the woman <WG1135> sitteth <WG2521> <WG3699>.

For <WG1063> God <WG2316> hath put <WG1325> in <WG1519> their <WG846> hearts <WG2588> to fulfil <WG4160> his <WG846> will <WG1106>, and <WG2532> to agree <WG4160> <WG3391> <WG1106>, and <WG2532> give <WG1325> their <WG846> kingdom <WG932> unto the beast <WG2342>, until <WG891> the words <WG4487> of God <WG2316> shall be fulfilled <WG5055>.
